name: Zhaolei Zhang
content: Zhaolei Zhang Homepage Banting & Best Molecular Genetics CGPGBB Donnelly CCBR U of Toronto Home People Research Teaching Funding Publications Journals Links Positions Contact The Zhang Lab Bioinformatics and Evolutionary Genomics Welcome! Bienvenue! Welcome to the laboratory of Zhaolei Zhang at the University of Toronto. We are an independent bioinformatics laboratory, affiliated with the following departments and programs: Donnelly Centre for Cellular and Biomolecular Research (CCBR) Banting and Best Department of Medical Research (BBDMR) Department of Molecular Genetics(Mol Gen) Department of Computer Science (DCS) Program in Genome Biology and Bioinformatics (GBB)
